title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has incorrect Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has incorrect Class.forName() usage
OB: The current implementation of BidiUtil in win32 has a line that uses Class.forName() method. This line creates a static Callback object named 'callback' in the org.eclipse.swt.internal.BidiUtil class.
EB: The line that uses Class.forName() method should be changed to use new BidiUtil().getClass() instead to remove the reflection.
SR: To fix this issue, change the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback (new BidiUtil().getClass(), 'windowProc', 4).
